itunes:title: Episode 462 - Special Guest Supermodel Angie Everhart
title: Episode 462 - Special Guest Supermodel Angie Everhart
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined one of the first OG Supermodels, Angie Everhart, as we discuss what it was like during her run in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit days with Cindy Crawford and Naomi Campbell, turning down Donald Trump after he f...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined one of the first OG Supermodels, Angie Everhart, as we discuss what it was like during her run in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit days with Cindy Crawford and Naomi Campbell, turning down Donald Trump after he filled a hotel suite full of roses, what it was like getting #Metoo'd by Harvey Weinstein, and an eerie conversation about her run in with Jeffery Epstein at his house. (*Show note - THIS EPISODE WAS RECORDED 24 HOURS BEFORE HIS JEFFERY EPSTEIN'S DEATH)

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
